Text: thank you for your time wush ! much appreciated !!

Thanks really appreciate the uploads but one thing that would be really cool would be if you could write the name of the day's guest (if any) in the title, like they do on jay leno show or letterman, that would help alot of fans of that perticular guest find the shows. Thanks again.
The setlist for the show is embedded in the ID3 tags so you can search the COMMENT field for any guest name or whatever you want.
